properties.entry: SELECT (SELECT sum(size) FROM FileRef fr, Section se, Submission su WHERE se.id = fr.sectionId AND su.id = se.submission_id AND su.version > 0) + (SELECT sum(size) FROM ReferencedFile rf, LibraryFile lf, Section se, Submission su WHERE se.libraryFileId = lf.id AND se.libraryFileId = rf.libraryFileId AND su.id = se.submission_id AND su.version > 0) AS submissionsTotalFileSize
